org.trianacode.gui.components.map

Class MapPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.trianacode.gui.components.map.MapPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ToolSelectionHandler, TaskGraphPanel, TaskGraphListener

    public class MapPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TaskGraphPanel, TaskGraphListener, ToolSelectionHandler
    A component that layouts the tasks out using geographic co-ordinates.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
